title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Entrepreneurial Exit Strategies (EP 60031) To follow relevant exit strategies from inception to going public, Financial restructuring, buy outs, private equity led management buy outs, leveraged buy outs and other aspects of financial engineering for exits, Consider the benefits and detriments of achieving liquidity through sale or merger, Gain an appreciation of an investors perspective of various liquidity alternatives
